item.title: Some old stuff for sharing
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: I think the following open source software resources could be helpful to you.本页面上是我认为可能对您有用的资源连接，目的是让您能以最小的时间和精力代价来体验开源软件。使用一个虚拟应用可
